featured.text: Instead of the traditional bare pod-sized style, new chains now feature interior design that appeals to digitally connected travelers from around the world.
Using empirical data from laboratory experiments 28 observations of a mid-sized Japanese bank in real life, researchers find that weather conditions indeed influence a worker’s focus.
the purchase of family-sized insecticide-treated mosquito nets costing $5 each.

definition.zh_def: 形狀或大小的，通常用於描述物體的尺寸或範圍。
definition.en_def: Having a specified size or dimension.
definition.example: The shirt is available in various sized options.
